text: Uns is an album by Brazilian singer Caetano Veloso, released in 1983. ==Track listing== # "Uns" (Caetano Veloso) # "Musical" (Péricles Cavalcanti) # "Eclipse oculto" (Veloso) # "Peter Gast" (Veloso) # "Quero ir a Cuba" (Veloso) # "Coisa mais linda" (Carlos Lyra, Vinícius de Moraes) # "Você é linda" (Veloso) # "Bobagens, meu filho, bobagens" (Marina Lima, Antonio Cícero) # "A outra banda da terra" (Veloso) # "Salva-vida" (Veloso) # "É hoje" (Didi, Mestrinho) ==Production== *Coordination and assistance in production: Marcia Alvarez *Recording engineer: Jairo Gualberto *Auxiliary Studio: Manuel and Marcio *Mixing and Editing: Jairo Gualberto João Augusto e Caetano Veloso *Court: Ivan Lisnik *Regimentation and copies: Clovis Mello *Creation, typography and layout: Oscar Ramos *Artwork: Jorge Vianna *Cover photo (Caetano, Roberto and Rodrigo Veloso): Carlos Alexandre Moreira Salles *Back Cover Photo: Arlete Kotchounian *Color photography: Peter Farkas *Graphic production: Edson Araujo ==Notes== Category:1983 albums Category:Caetano Veloso albums
title: Uns (album)
